text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: The horsegirls who entrust their feelings to the training horsegirl are known as successor horsegirls.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Once you have completed your training and had your horsegirl registered in the Hall of Fame, you will be able to select her as a successor.
color_text_info_list:
registered in the 
Hall of Fame

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Depending on the horsegirl's factors and feelings, you can receive various benefits, such as improving starting stats and acquiring new skills.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Even if you choose her as a successor, you won't lose that horsegirl, so don't be worried!
